entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Debug breakpoint step over throws an access violation exception #73389
  • F1 on type parameter symbols declared in source opens MSDN at completely unrelated pages #73388
  • VB Span Perf Issue #73387
  • Errors for scoped differences in override indexers are missing in some cases #73384

Closed

  • CSharpIntroduceParameterCodeRefactoringProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #73304
    17.11
  • Hot Reload fails with "ENC1002: The given key <assembly> was not present in the dictionary." #67497
  • Collection expression IL could be simplified for single span element #72566
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Use null for diagnostic ExpandedMessage so the client falls back appropriately #73395
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add dummy type to SemanticSearch.ReferenceAssemblies #73390
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ignore drive casing when comparing on windows platforms #73380
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove compile-time dependency from Workspace.MSBuild on Workspace.MSBuild.BuildHost #73393
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Provide solution methods to allow updating a bulk set of documents at once. #73394
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Run phases of code cleanup in parallel #73386
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue with improper formatting in introduce-variable #73392
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fixup improper parenthesized expression in 'use pattern combinators'. #73391
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do syntactic cleanup during the initial pass of producing fixed documents in fix-all. #73383
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • EnC: Add asterisk based assembly version docs #73364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Share fix-all code #73385
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Have code refactoring tests run in OOP mode by default #73381
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #73382
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Have code action tests run in OOP mode by default #73372
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use a simple temp instead of InlineArray1 #73086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unnecessary project reference to System.Text.Json #73370
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update partial properties feature branch from main #73377
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73379
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add dynamic registration for razor and cshtml files #73369
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Partial properties: basic indexer scenarios and signature mismatch diagnostics #73378
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Fix sorting of extensions from more specific to less #73276
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Enable hosts to provide custom assembly resolution #73185
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: workaround for empty display class #73366
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Continue visiting bad named argument if not target-typed in NullableWalker #73326
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Fix overload resolution regression around params parameters #73373
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Run final fix-all code-cleanup phase out of process. #73357
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove IsCompatBreakingFeatureEnabled method #73371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Fix Double-to-Long overflow check #73016
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.11
